title: Move About section to the top of the page

requirements.summary: Reorder VideoFeedPage to display AboutSection above the video grid instead of below it
acceptanceCriteria: The AboutSection component renders above the video grid on the VideoFeedPage.
All existing personal bio content (Florida Dave's about info) is preserved and visible in the section.
The WaveDivider components still separate the About section from adjacent content appropriately.
The video grid continues to render correctly below the About section.

file_operations.description: Move the AboutSection component to render before the video grid container. Ensure the AboutSection appears immediately after the page's opening fragment or container, followed by the loading skeletons/video cards/empty state. Preserve all existing WaveDivider components and bio content within AboutSection.
